AmountDC.description: Amount in the default currency of the company

AmountDiscount.description: Discount amount in the currency of the transaction

AmountDiscountExclVat.description: Discount amount excluding VAT in the currency of the transaction

AmountFC.description: Amount in the currency of the transaction

Created.description: Date and time on which the quotation was created

CustomerItemCode.description: Code the customer uses for this item

Description.description: By default this contains the item description

Discount.description: Discount given on the default price. This is stored as a fraction. ie 5.5% is stored as .055

Item.description: Reference to the item that is sold in this quotation line

LineNumber.description: Indicates the sequence of the lines within one quotation

Modified.description: Date and time on which the quotation was last modified

NetPrice.description: Net price of the quotation line

Quantity.description: The number of items sold in default units. The quantity shown in the entry screen is Quantity * UnitFactor

QuotationID.description: Identifies the quotation. All the lines of a quotation have the same QuotationID

QuotationNumber.description: Unique number to indentify the quotation. By default this number is based on the setting for first available number

VATAmountFC.description: VAT amount of the line in the currency of the transaction

VATCode.description: The VAT code that is used when the quotation is invoiced

VATPercentage.description: The VAT percentage of the VAT code
